answer:
QUESTION
If DAJJAAL were to be here would shooting him do any harm to him, what I mean is could anyone kill him with a knife or a gun or another similar weapon?
ANSWER


Share:
In theory, it is possible to kill Dajjaal as he would be a human being.

However, Eesa (Alayhis salaam) will be given the exclusive right to kill
him. So, even if others try to kill Dajjaal, they will not succeed.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
